lead_paragraph: CHUNGKING, Jan. 31 (U.P.) -- An entire division of Japanese-equipped Nanking soldiers has deserted to Generalissimo Chiang Kai-shek, it was announced today. The desertion was attributed to the United States entry into the war.
abstract: Nanking Govt div deserts to Chiang Kai-shek forces, North Anhwei
snippet: CHUNGKING, Jan. 31 (U.P.) -- An entire division of Japanese-equipped Nanking soldiers has deserted to Generalissimo Chiang Kai-shek, it was announced today. The desertion was attributed to the United States entry into the war....
